name: Bop's Broccoli Cauliflower Salad
author: Natalie Escue
summary: A nice crunch in this salad, real bacon bits, diced broccoli, cauliflower, shredded sharp Cheddar cheese and onion are tossed with a yummy, sweet, and tart dressing and chilled. Be prepared to give this recipe to everyone when taking it to a covered dish gathering. It is the hit of the party at every gathering I've taken it to! It is very addicting! Enjoy!
ingredients: 5 slices bacon, or more to taste
¾ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
½ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels and crumble
Stir broccoli, cauliflower, Cheddar cheese, and onion together in a large bowl
Whisk creamy salad dressing, sugar, and vinegar together in a separate bowl until sugar is dissolved; pour over broccoli mixture and toss to coat
Refrigerate salad for at least 30 minutes
Stir crumbled bacon into salad just before serving
